Title: Passenger Pigeons
Writer: Martha Stephens (screenplay), Martha Stephens (story), Martha Stephens
Actors: Kentucker Audley, Will Casse, Karrie Crouse, Jim Johnstone
Plot: Set among the coalfields of Eastern Kentucky, 'Passenger Pigeons' is a story about finding hope and beauty in the dark hills of Appalachia. The film quietly interweaves four separate story ...
